lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said violations of financial and economic discipline are common, including tax evasion, false accounting, embezzlement, theft, extravagance and accepting and offering bribes.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The only allocations not to be affected by the general 10 pct cutback are subsidies for price rises, repayment of principal and interest on domestic and foreign loans, funds for the disabled and spending for other social relief.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said China is running no risk in using more foreign loans, provided it prepares careful feasibility studies, borrows only what it can repay and uses the loans only to develop production in priority sectors.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said violations of financial and economic discipline are common, including tax evasion, false accounting, embezzlement, theft, extravagance and accepting and offering bribes.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said China is running no risk in using more foreign loans, provided it prepares careful feasibility studies, borrows only what it can repay and uses the loans only to develop production in priority sectors.
